poem:
Title: "To Pay Tribute to Sail: A Silent Companion"

A greyhound named Sail, silent in steps,
Navigated the heart, where shyness slept.
Each stride a mantra, a whispered tale,
An echo of friendship in life's grand scale.
Lit up the world in spectra unseen,
In the spaces where silence had always been.
His silence, a gift that taught to tell,
Our stories stitched in the times we fell.
